channel.title: Python on DevRa
channel.description: Recent content in Python on DevRa

item.title: Tips & Tricks to Make Python Faster!
item.description: Python is known for being slow in terms of execution speed. However, you can try out the following tricks to make your code faster. Ways to improve: Identify slow functions and improve them Use built-in data types instead of custom ones Use a cache Use local variables Reduce access to attributes Beware of strings Use generators Use numba 1.

item.title: Powerful Python One Liners
item.description: Why write more code when you can write less? Become a Python Ninja with the below one-liners.
